name: Attention: Pay It!
description:
Are you ready for the first ever Hardcore Action Puzzle Memory Game?

Complete each level as fast as you can for Trophies, Game Center Leaderboards, and in intense head-to-head battle.

Attention: Pay It is a fast paced multi-touch game that tests your ability to multitask. You have to be quick, you have to be precise, but most importantly you have to pay attention.

- 48 Single Player Levels with a new puzzle or variation added every 2nd level.
- 6 Challenge Levels to test your speed against the world on the Game Center Leaderborads.
- Survival and Sequence Mode - See how long you last in one random and one predetermined level.
- Online Multiplayer – Race to complete the same newly generated level against an opponent.
- Social Multiplayer – Share a level created just for you on Facebook, Twitter, or with a Link to challenge anyone to beat your time.

Forget the tired Match 3 formula or near random swiping you are used to and unlock the full power of your mind. Attention: Pay It! will push your fingers to the limit. Are you ready to Attention: Pay It?

Are you?
